text:
NEW: NJ has 868 new confirmed positive cases of #COVID19, pushing our total to 160,445. Of those cases:
➡️2,469 are in hospitals
➡️522 are in critical or intensive care
➡️378 are on ventilators

Sadly, we’ve lost 66 more New Jerseyans, pushing our total to 11,698 lives lost. https://t.co/1hFJHdv2YX
